title: ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for Scientific Assistant Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Scientific Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, and M. Sc can apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned th...
